releaseMessage: You can listen to "Ya es Navidad" now!

info.title: Ya es Navidad
info.subtitle: Already available
info.text: Can you hear those jingle bells? 'Ya es Navidad' is our song for this Christmas and we wanted it to sound like all those moments that really matter, the ones that make these dates have a special place in your heart. We hope you listen to it a lot these days and happy holidays!

pressKit.title: Press kit
pressKit.text: Here you can download our press kit

20240103.title: Festival Actual battle of bands
20240103.text: We are kicking off 2025 in the best possible way. This January 3rd we will be in Logroño at the Sala Fundición playing in the battle of bands of the Festival Actual. Starting at 19:00 and free entry. See you in La Rioja!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

presave.title: Ya es Navidad
presave.subtitle: Avaiable on December 6th
presave.text: This year, we have a very special surprise for you. On December 6th, we officially kick off the holiday season with our carol ‘Ya es Navidad’. Make sure to pre-save it!

contest.fib: Vote for us to play at FIB!

fiestasArganzuela.title: Fiestas de Arganzuela 2024
fiestasArganzuela.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
fiestasArganzuela.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Fiestas de La Melonera in Arganzuela in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!

ley.title: New music video
ley.subtitle: Ley de la atracción
ley.text: We’ve just released our music video for 'Ley de la atracción', filmed in the heart of Madrid with the collaboration of real couples who shared unique moments with us to bring this song to life. We hope you like it!

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.info:
We are a Madrid-based indie pop rock band.

We love art, cinema, great soundtracks, series, pop culture... All of this influences our songwriting.

Our music reflects who we are, and we try to make you experience new sensations with us or connect by feeling something that resonates with you.

We enjoy what we do and want you to be a part of it.
